scripts.build: waku build --with-cloudflare && cp -r public/fonts dist/assets/fonts 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r public/wasm dist/assets/wasm 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start:nix: nix shell nixpkgs#wrangler nixpkgs#nodejs -c wrangler dev
scripts.d1:list: wrangler d1 execute init --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.r2:upload-sample: echo 'Upload parquet files: wrangler r2 object put waku-data/sample.parquet --file=./data/sample.parquet'
